title: Honor Ward Skin
body: I just got honor 4 after reforming a few months ago, and I REALLY don't like the ward for this honor level. Is there ANY way I can get the honor 3 ward without being toxic?

replies.body: I am honor 5 as well and didn't receive my ward skin. Very confused
Same here! ☹️
same
It said i got it and I don't have it. Riot plez fix
lvl 5 here. didnt got my skin ward yet.
Me too, and I didn't get the ward skin. Is this a bug or something? _**I'm confused**_
you'll just have to wait a while, as i only just got mine
me too
yeah me 2
do u have now?

We've definitely heard all of these suggestions about the honor ward rewards this year, but we won't have a way to trade those out. You'll be getting whichever honor ward lines up with the rank you ended at. We're looking into ways of making this a little bit better of an experience for everyone in the future though.

Would there be a way to give a player all of the lower-tier wards if they are lvl 5 though? (or if they were lvl 4 then they would get the lvl 3 aswell) Or if that's not the case, allow lvl 5 people to choose which one of the three they want? (or two in the case of lvl 4)
Personally, I dislike the way the lvl 5 ward looks and _really_ like the way the lvl 4 ward looks, but because I am level 5 and because of how the system works I can only get the lvl 4 if I decide to be toxic on purpose _just for the sake of the ward._
If anything, it would further incentivize people to be higher-honor players if this system was in place.
That's fine and all but where is my ward skin? I still haven't received it and I've been LVL 5 before the preseason.
Not all of the rewards have been distributed yet is all. If you still don't have yours in a week or so, hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

I hardly ever see them and only just now realized that they are supposed to have been given out. When was the cutoff point for getting the ward skin? I'll definitely send a ticket about not receiving one if I remember having over honor 2 by that time. :)
Sounds good, Thanks!
When do players actually earn their new honor ward skins? I'm level 4 and I was hoping to use the ward skin but can't choose it in lobby and don't see it in loot :(
I ended with honor 5 (preseason to s8) and didnt receive an honor 5 ward any way you could help me out?

I think that players must be ranked in order to get the honor wards. I'm honor 5, but I still never received the honor wards ;(. My friend who is in honor 4 still managed to get his ward. (He's ranked)
I'm unranked and received my ward skin. I'd hit up support if you don't have yours by the end of the week.
I'm only honor level 3 but I got the skin

I also don't have any Honor Wards and I have (and had) Honour Level 5 long before the patch went through.
It also wouldn't make sense for us to not get the lower Honour level Honor Wards than the level we reached (i.e. level 4 should get 3 & 4, level 5 should get all three).
I don't even see where to change wards now, but then I don't have any custom wards so I'm currently putting it down to the possibility that the ward skin button is now gone from the game lobby if you don't have any custom wards.
so I was spectating a game and see their team has an honor 5 ward skin. when will I get one or just certain players get it?
I didnt got my ward skin too.. I´m honor lvl 5 and still got nothing.
